text: Breakdowns are good to have in there, especially if what you've done includes something that a recruiter or somebody revieiwing your reel might not notice from the final thing.

Okay thank you! Also I tried that heat distortion thing and I got it to work! However it didn’t work for my shot where my orb is moving but I’ll definitely be using that technique in the future! :relaxed:
Oh amazing, well done! You'll be surprised how it comes in handy later down the line :smile:
Yeah I already have some ideas for it! Also do you know how to use the motion blur node because I tried to make it work but it just made my orb squish and look a bit funny.
